org.xchain.framework.scanner

Interface ProtocolScanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BundleProtocolScanner, FileProtocolScanner, JarProtocolScanner, VfsProtocolScanner, ZipProtocolScanner

    public interface ProtocolScanner

    Implementations of the class add support for scanning the entries of different types of protocols.

    Author:
    Christian Trimble

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void scan(ScanNode rootNode, java.net.URL rootUrl)
      Scans the entire root URL and adds its entries into the root node specified.
